original_text: And then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord Jesus will kill with the breath of his mouth and bring to nothing by the appearance of his coming.
korean_text: 그 때에 불법한 자가 나타나리니 주 예수께서 그 입의 기운으로 그를 죽이시고 강림하여 나타나심으로 폐하시리라

sentences.original_text: And then the lawless one will be revealed
whom the Lord Jesus will kill
with the breath of his mouth
by the appearance of his coming
